thread.title: BRIEF-AES Announces Early Results Of Tender Offers

title: BRIEF-AES Announces Early Results Of Tender Offers
text: March 15, 2018 / 12:56 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-AES Announces Early Results Of Tender Offers Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - AES Corp: * AES ANNOUNCES EARLY RESULTS OF TENDER OFFERS FOR UP TO $700,000,000 AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ITS 5.500% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2024 AND 5.500% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2025 AND CONSENT SOLICITATION FOR ITS 5.500% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2024 * AES CORP - ‍SETTLEMENT DATE FOR SECURITIES TENDERED AND ACCEPTED FOR PURCHASE IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR BY MARCH 29, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
